parameters.name: Energy_Range_ID

parameters.description: Total Background counts per spin

parameters.description: O+ number flux for 28 energy and 3 selected angle bins - quality flag applied.

parameters.description: % Sigma for O+ number flux for 28 energies and 3 selected angle bins - quality flag applied.

parameters.name: Sigma_OVQ
parameters.description: % Sigma for O+ number flux for 6 selected energies and 12 angle bins  - quality flag applied.

parameters.description: Time, time between HFWR points in this snapshot.

parameters.description: Time, time between WBR points

parameters.description: Filter Mode: 0-2 = 90 kHz, 3 = 1-3 kHz, 4 = 20 kHz, 5 = 3-6 kHz, 6 = 10-16 kHz, 7 = 10 kHz

parameters.description: Data Quality:  0 = OK, 1 = clipped or questionable

parameters.description: WBR Electric Field (mV/M)
